description: Step into comfort with a lightweight and versatile mid-cut shoe. Pairing a Mammut Swiss Design sole for reliable grip with an EVA midsole and high stack height for cushioning and shock absorption, it’s a great partner for mixed terrain. Keeping it breezy with a breathable mesh outer fabric, its waterproof Gore-Tex membrane has you covered in less-than-ideal conditions. For great comfort at a minimal weight, the clear choice is Sertig.
name: Mammut Sertig II Mid GTX - Mens
